events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application.
The initial screening interview was conducted and your technical skills seemed to align well with our requirements.
We received your prompt response indicating your interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 am via video call with our lead developer.
